high_descs: Turn around, walk forward toward the night stand and turn right and walk to the alarm clock on the desk.
Pick up the alarm clock from the desk.
Turn right and walk forward to the lamp on the small night stand near the wall.
anns.task_desc: Examine an alarm clock by the light of a lamp on a night stand.

high_descs: Turn around and walk to the wooden desk on the right.
Pick up the brown clock to the left of the cell phone on the desk.
Turn right, hang a right at the door and walk to the small wooden dresser on the left.
Turn on the small lamp on the right side of the dresser.
anns.task_desc: Examine a clock by the light of a small lamp.

high_descs: Turn around to walk to the desk.
Pick up the clock from the desk.
Turn right to walk to the nightstand.
Turn on the lamp on the nightstand.
anns.task_desc: Look at a clock by a lit lamp.
